tool.name: Gene inference by parsimony with FDR estimation
tool.description: Infer genes by global parsmiony and estimate gene FDR
tool.command: cp -f ${input} data.psm && NGENE=`awk -F, '{print $2}' ${__tool_directory__}/../lib/CPTAC-CDAP-Reports/ProteinMapping/${genemap} | sort -u | wc -l` && echo "Total genes: \$NGENE" && DATA="${input.name.split('.',1)[0]}" && FDR="${specfdr}" && export TMPDIR=\$PWD && ${__tool_directory__}/../lib/CPTAC-CDAP-Reports/parsnip1 -d data.psm -U ${unique} -T ${specfdr} -C ${speccnt} --tieresolution ${tieresolution} --pepweights ${pepweights} --bygene #if $pracc --pracc ${pracc} #end if --mode Stats,Dump --itersolve 50 --ttotal 15 --noalignments --extension pars && ${__tool_directory__}/../lib/CPTAC-CDAP-Reports/mayu --bygene --accessions data.pars.txt --summary \$NGENE data.psm > data.pars.mayu.txt && awk -v F="\$DATA" -v T="\$FDR" '{printf("%s\t%s\t%s\t%s\t%s\t%s\t%s\n",F,T,$4,$5,$6,$7,$8)}' < data.pars.mayu.txt > data.pars.mayu.tsv

param.name: unique
param.label: Unshared/Unique Peptides required per Inferred Gene
